name: Karmarvest
description: Welcome to Karmarvest, the video game where you will have to cultivate your destiny and your karma as the most precious harvest. You embody a character and with seed that you plant in the ground : it can germinate immediately or years later. But in any case, you must take care of it and kept it away from weeds. Fate and karma are like the natural elements that will influence your harvest. They can be supportive and help you reap the rewards of your efforts, or they can be unfavorable and put the field of your hopes in danger.
